text: Va ahli kitoʙ parokanda nasudand, magar ʙa'd az on ki ʙarojason ʙurhone ravsan omad. Va on ʙurhon Pajomʙari Alloh Muhammad sallallohu alajhi va sallam ʙud, ki dar Tavrotu Incil ʙarojason va'da doda suda ʙud. Hama dar pajomʙarii u ittifoq ʙudand. Pas on hangom, ki ʙa pajomʙari maʙ'us gardid, inkor kardand va parokanda sudand
